snippet.title: Don't Get a Virus - Demo Released!
snippet.description:
Download the "Don't Get a Virus" demo! This demo contains the first fight of the game. Tell me what you think! What could be improved?
Download the game from these fine websites:
Gamejolt: http://gamejolt.com/games/don-t-get-a-virus/148084
Github: https://github.com/1029chris/dont-get-a-virus/releases
Itch.io: https://1029chris.itch.io/dont-get-a-virus
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/dont-get-a-virus/downloads

I've released this demo to gather feedback on the first level, so that I may use that feedback while creating future levels. Have fun!

Fight for your computers life as different viruses try to destroy it! Use your antivirus software to blast away the viruses, but make sure the antivirus doesn't get hit itself! This game is a work in progress. Play the demo, and give some feedback! It would be very much appreciated. When the full version is complete, it will probably cost money.

Don't Get a Virus requires a keyboard and mouse. This game basically works like an operating system. You control the antivirus window by dragging it around and clicking on the fire button. You can change the wallpaper and game difficulty in the settings application.

---

“Thrills and Spills” by Jay Man www.ourmusicbox.com
